name: Heavy Duty (itch)
description:
H E A V Y  D U T Y  is a first person thriller/spooky horror video game developed by RECKON STUDIOS and published by SWIFTLINE STUDIOS. The game features cinematic depiction of story telling.

SYNOPSIS

Alex Winter, a war-veteran of the Second Cold War, finds himself trapped in a basement after performing a failed robbery, where he starts to perceive different monsters and creatures which starts to confuse him with reality.

Updates on the way. YET TO COME...

How to Play

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

**Go near interactable objects to interact. No button input required.
